info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 04 at 2:00PM MDT until September 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND A GUSTY WIND FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 135 AND 136... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY A AND GUSTY WIND FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 135 AND 136... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM MDT Monday. The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM MDT Monday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 134. * TIMING... Noon to 9 PM Today and Noon to 9 PM Monday. * TEMPERATURES...Highs ranging from 90 to 100. * WIND...West 10 to 20 mph and gusting to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.
